name: Berry Kamikazi
description: Jen Schwertman, a bartender at Tom and Jerry's, a bar on Elizabeth Street in New York, invented this drink that's like a cocktail and a snow cone in one. No ice shaver? It's also delicious straight up in a shot glass.

recipeInstructions.text:
Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into shot glass. (Recipe yields two shots.) 
To make a snow cone, strain over a scoop of shaved ice in a shot glass.
